Summary: Huge triangles with red lights that change random colors when,stationary
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting DetailsI first seen the object in 2009 after I was leaving a friend house gettin a tattoo. I looked up in the sky & seen a blinking light the size of a quarter & I thought it was a star. But I thought about it & I told myself stars aint that big but I decided 2 let it go. But I just kept on seeing it... I have seen up to11 of them... They hover around every single day silently for 2 years now like they are plotting in something.... But u guys can give me a call & I can explain a whole lot of more details & if you guys can come out here you can see for yourself... I can show u all they setup points & fly around spots. I see them through my binoculars I even seen an invisible one. It flew over my head in broad day light on my,way 2 work. At first it was a glowin light from a distance just hovering but then it started to fly over me thats when u noticed it was 2 blinking lights on a invisible shell.. It was invisible in the light but u can still see. Please call me (216)956-4144 THANK YOU IM READY TO PROVE EVERYBODY WRONG BECAUSE I DIDNT USE TO BELIEVE NOW IM A BELIEVER BECAUSE MY EYES DONT LIE & NEITHER DO MY FAMILY & FRIENDS EYES LUE EITHER
